website_summaries.verdict: Smart design for those who need to pull the pressure washer along while working.
pros: Uses a 4-wheel design that makes it easy to move while you're working
Delivers 1,800 psi and 1.3 gallons per minute of water
Control the pressure level directly from the wand
cons: Will not last if used constantly over time
May struggle to reach 1,800 psi level

customer_reviews.title: NO chance this is 1800psi
customer_reviews.text: I use pressure washers often and, finally, someone got wise and put the water input on the other side of the device from the hose output but, no way this is 1800psi. As others mention, it is a bit on the cheaply made side but, that's expected from Karcher. Update: Tried to use it to wash car, simply did not function. Returning item. Dear Karcher; Excellent concept, poor implementation.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Kmiecik

customer_reviews.title: Trusting a German brand, I purchased this product, ...
customer_reviews.text: Trusting a German brand, I purchased this product, but after two month of normal use in my household suddenly water started to spray out of the body. I opened it and realized that everything is made in China and that the plastic pump cylinder head had cracked. This is either a design flaw or material issue. Definitely not a product to purchase until this is fixed!
customer_reviews.author: Pcabrera

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product Never started out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this item recently, I had it for some time in the garage but never used it, when I took it out of the box, everything looks great no missing parts I had everything ready to clean my car, but it would never start. I used different plugs on different walls with no response, Now it is just collecting dust. Worst buy ever!!
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine cleaned well and I loved the adjustable spray head. I like the 4 wheels and it made it easier to move around. After using for only 2 1/2 hours something within the machine broke and water was pouring out of the inside. I was very disappointed in this pressure washer. I feel it was cheaply constructed. I contacted Amazon and I was able to send it back at their expense with no hassle and they credited my account.
customer_reviews.author: Armand Jalbert

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Lasted maybe 5 hours of cleaning now if pulses the pressure and is useless. It's trying to work but won't stay on. These things are too expensive to be such junk. will never buy Karcher again. Another brand that has went cheap. Looks like I'll just have to buy a cheap one and replace it every year. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Flores

customer_reviews.title: After 2+ years still working strong without any issues
customer_reviews.text: Ok this power wash is great, one thing that make me get it was that can be move around with me because there 4 wheels, the regulars are either 2 wheels or stationary, and depend for i using could be very uncomfortable. The pression is good and constant, i do use to clear the outside walls, my cars, and the concrete driveway and sidewalk around my house and work great. I recommend to have a extra long extension for power depend where u going to be and the water hose as well.
customer_reviews.author: Terranova

customer_reviews.title: ... block of aluminum and I had to beat the crap out of them to get them to go in
customer_reviews.text: I had to drive the swivel wheels in with a hammer and a block of aluminum and I had to beat the crap out of them to get them to go in. I am shocked nothing broke during the beating process. I get so frustrated with this cheap junk that does not work correctly or assemble correctly. Everybody wants to make a really really cool product with bells and whistles, I just want something that works that I don't have to fight with. Update: Broke after only a few hours of use. Motor runs continuously, no pressure. Evidently the coupling between motor and pump is broken. I am not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: T. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Karcher Can Always Be Counted On!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the K3 Follow-Me (1800psi) to replace a Karcher 230 (1400psi) and after spending the afternoon cleaning up a driveway with 20 years of tire tracks, etc, all I can say is that the Karcher engineers have a homerun with this product. The Follow-Me capability is enough to make me smile in that the older model was a standup unit that continually fell over whenever you moved from one spot to another. That issue is gone! The added pressure helps a lot and the adjustable wand and heavy-dirt wand perform their mission flawlessly. Highly recommend this item for any homeowner who wants a kick-aXX cleanup tool!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. F. Sisti

customer_reviews.title: Machine would not run.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this pressure washer for routine maintenance around my house. I ordered it last spring, but didn't have an opportunity to open the box to use it because it rained constantly throughout the spring and early summer in TX this year. Finally, the weather has gotten hot and it's possible to pressure wash. So, we opened the box and put the machine together, only to discover that it will not run. I have contacted Karcher, who said they would give us a replacement, but I do not have some of the items, such as the silver sticker from the unit, that they are requesting for the replacement. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Hydanus

customer_reviews.title: Great little power washer but front wheels don’t want to seat.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had Karcher power washers and liked the size and power of this one. The fact that it would follow me was what made me purchase this model. No problems putting it together until I got to the front wheels and I CANNOT get them to click into place for the life of me! (I was using hand pressure only though) I used it anyway on my deck as I had company coming and the deck was dingy. I’ll try to seat the wheels again with more force before I use it again or contact the manufacturer. Other than the wheel issue I’m perfectly happy with the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Clever--but, some reservations
customer_reviews.text: The follow-me concept is a good one. This is one of the easiest units to us that I have encountered. Pressure is lower than expected, I would be surprised if this is 1,800 psi, but effective enough. The plug is absurd it is a large ground fault interrupter, which wants to pull itself from a wall plug. The unit has a caddy on top for nozzles, I am not sure why the designers bothered, it simply does not hold the nozzles, a disappointment. It is okay for the price, rated meh.
customer_reviews.author: Kubtrac

customer_reviews.title: Not a good system, too fragile
customer_reviews.text: My past pressure washer broke after 1 winter because i had not purged it properly. For this one, I was meticulous. I drained the tubing on a slope blew air in it and attempted (not very successfully to drip in antifreeze. The unit was in a garage at 45F. Still 2 years later it would not pressure. While it worked it was pretty ok but not very powerful and the Follow-me was not useful. Our driveway as a minor lean to it and the Karcher would attempt to go downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Jeanty

customer_reviews.title: Great concept that works well!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Works great! Havent blown anything apart with it yet! ...and doesnt tip over like the upright ones! Cleaned my deck well without splintering the edges of the redwood boards . Rolls around and follows you. My last Karcher pressure washer lasted 15 years of heavy homeowner use and just failed this season, so this is it's replacement. I am so happy with it and the afforrdable price, I bought a secong one for keeping over at my inlaws, so I dont have to drag mine around so often! Money well spent! Will revisit this review in a while for an update!
customer_reviews.author: PowderMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Karcher K3 suddenly lost all pressure
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was halfway through the second (maybe third) use of the power washer today. The Karcher K3 suddenly lost all pressure. I turned it off/on, no change. Turned off the water, disconnected all hoses, let the machine "drain"; reconnected everything again, no change. I was cleaning off the deck and deck furniture. I did this last summer, as well as the patio underneath. So, not many hours on the machine at all. Anyone else have this happen to them? What did you do? Any fix? KARCHER, if you see this, PLEASE HELP.
customer_reviews.author: maverick0316

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Impressive little power washer. Went a little crazy when I first got this and washed our front sidewalk, driveway, a large portion of our wood fence and a large flagstone patio. It was easy to assemble and ease of use is a no-brainer. This weekend I used the power spray wand and cleaned up a grill. I'd recommend this to anyone wanting an inexpense, solid power washer. One minor complaint - getting this back together for storage is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: mikef

customer_reviews.title: Hcp accessible
customer_reviews.text: Don Pettit, here. My recent purchase of the Follow Me K3000 has been a blessing. I am a stroke survivor and paralyzed on left side, and I was able to assemble all parts and operate the machine with ease. I have had past machines that I had to stop and move as I worked and with the follow me , I was able to pull it around easily. The spray attachment worked wonderfully. I highly reccomend this machine for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Custome. Don Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 1 years ago. It was difficult to assemble, but once assembled I was able to get some pressure. If the hose or the line for the pressure washer get kinked then it stops working (blow a fuse). Then I have to reset it...not ideal. Now that spring and summer are here, I would like to try it again but there is water leaking from the bottom of the machine, the soap dispenser doesn't work, and the cords get tangled, and its not holding pressure. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had thought about buying a pressure washer so I started researching various brands. This is the one I chose due to all the other reviews and comments---and he was not disappointed! It is so easy to use and not a major ordeal to get it out. It doesn't take up much space either (like some of the other larger machines). We use it to wash the walkways, house, sidewalks, and next I'm doing the windows. He was very very happy with this one and loved the way it rolled around and was easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these power washers. They assembled quickly and easily and worked very well.... for a short period of time. The first one died within months of using it heavily. I bought a second one... had to send it back because it didn't work from the beginning. Amazon replaced it. Used that one again for some heavy duty consistent washing and within a few months, it too died. They work great.... until suddenly they don't! I will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: CAWeyer

customer_reviews.title: It works better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: It works better than I thought it would. For sidewalks I switched the wand and it cleaned it faster than expected! With an update-----after using this for less than a year, the water started to come out the bottom and something in the housing is broken. I see that this unit was made in Mexico. Cheap parts---not German at all. Very disappointed. Going to contact the company. I love this unit when it worked!!!!!!! Update 6-6-17 I contacted the company and they sent me a new one right away! 5 stars on customer service!!! Hope this one lasts longer! Back to cleaning sidewalks, decks,siding, and cars! Thank you Karcher!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Karcher Quality
customer_reviews.text: it has lived up to the Karcher name would recommend this anyone with medium to light duty cleaning work. I used it to clean condenser coils on large commercial AC units was the perfect match for this job.
customer_reviews.author: DARichards

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I had a very hard time assembling the wheels. I used it to clean the concrete patio and came out really nice with minimum effort on my part. (I'm a petite woman). I'll recommend this product to all the single ladies out there.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Linares

customer_reviews.title: Good water pressure
customer_reviews.text: Enough power for a car wash. Lightweight. Very quick to set and portable. Low noise level when working. Not to much water consumption. 4 Star, why? I have enough pressure for a car wash, either way I have a water leak in the spray gun connection with the VPS wand. That is not great, considering I'm using for the first time. If becomes worst, I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo António Marques de Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Great for this Grandma.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second time purchasing this pressure washer. I got one years ago and loved it, but so did my friend who did a bunch of stuff for me. He "borrowed " it and I never asked for it back. Now I needed one so I bought another one and it is so easy to use - still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quite washer.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is quite unlike other much louder less powerful electric washers I have used in the past. I don't have to worry about waking my neighbors. It works as advertised, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: WT

customer_reviews.title: First use
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, You really need to be strong; the front wheels are extremely hard to get on. Some of the attachments are hard to put together. I’m not crazy about stopping to adjust the speed. It did clean the bricks which had baked on dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great little pressure washer.  Lots of power.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I love this pressure washer! It's our second one, as the first one quit pumping correctly after a couple of years, and we had loved it, and used it so much that we decided to go back with the same one. It's lightweight, easy to assemble, and easy to use. We especially like the added extra of having the ability to attach the hose connector to the hose, then pop it into place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Two of These and both broke within months
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my husband last year and the pump cracked, even though it was winterized. I bought him another for Fathers Day (because it worked well, while it was working) year and the pump cracked on this unit as well. I tried calling the customer service (Friday 1PM) this is during their normal business hours and the recording cut me off and instructed me to call back during normal business hours. Frustrating! I would have gave it one star, but it did work well when it was working so I gave it two.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Get This One!  You Won't Be Sorry
customer_reviews.text: I purposely waited a year to write this review. I simply love this Karcher Follow-Me Pressure Washer. It is so easy to tote behind you and isn't bulky. Very easy to put together. The first one I received was leaking oil at delivery and Amazon exchanged it - no problems. I highly recommend getting the extension pieces for higher / harder to reach areas. It has great pressure for spots really needing it, but scale back the pressure to a rinse-like setting. I also got the brush attachment and detergent but haven't used it yet. Hardest part is getting all the attachments stored away so nicely on the top of it as pictured! GET THIS ONE! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product for home use. The "follow-me" ability is very nice and sure beats having to move a unit around by hand like most of the rest I researched.
customer_reviews.author: B man

customer_reviews.title: Cute but worthless machine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine three years ago and have used it, maybe four times. After the second use a front wheels broke off. Today, use number four the entire unit started pouring water out from the bottom. I bought a few accesssories for it so I’m out that money too. I paid $70 more on Amazon when I bought it in 2015. I guess they had to slash the price because of the lousy reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Lulupee

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase it complete junk.
customer_reviews.text: I would have said that it works great but sadly it worked for us about 5 times. Today my husband went to power wash the deck and it started leaking. Don't buy this power washer it isn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam&Kim

customer_reviews.title: A good tool for lower power usage
customer_reviews.text: This is a useful tool. It certainly has nothing like the power of a gas washer, but neither does it have its noise and maintenance requirements. There are many times when you want a lower power setting, and appreciate the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: Only used about 9 times & stopped running... Very disappointed in product !!!!
customer_reviews.author: joni

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and light weight. We love it! We use it to pressure was the patio and sidewalks and to wash cars and patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!!! Purchased last year - ...
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY IT!!! Purchased last year - worked once. Attempted to use this year and it works for 10 mins and stops. I'm assuming that the internal breaker over heated after 10 mins, doing a 4x4 area, and will not turn back on. Everything is cleared off the area - I'm ready to power wash and instead I'm on the computer shopping for another one. LOOK FOR A DIFFERENT UNIT
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Pump broke.
customer_reviews.text: After using this three times for a total of maybe four hours it quit working. Water just gushes from the belly of the unit. It seems like the pump seal broke or something similar. Very disappointed. I will be seeking a refund. Update. After a very easy process I received a replacement unit. Hopefully this one lasts. Good service.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Speith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: update!!!! purchased September 18, 2017... used it literally a few times maybe three.... packed it up for winter. get it out.... guess what?? That's right kids, pos does not work!!! If you're looking to spend a hundred plus bucks and only use one season - you're in lucky, this is what you want. We however thought it would be good for a couple of seasons, washing down the side of the house, maybe the car & truck. NOPE - HUSBAND WENT TO MENARDS, PURCHASED A NEW POWER WASHER... and it was cheaper and works, unlike this pos
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Adorable size ...
customer_reviews.text: Sept. 18, 2018 - just got done with using it. Pretty simple set up. Not rocket science. Size is adorable, no bigger than a carry on suitcase. Not noisy like the gas powered. Cord is long, bout 30ft or so. Pressure hose is about 16ft. Vadio nozzle isn’t positional. The Dirt Buster is orbital high pressure wash. Not sure if I will run into other problems like other buyers. Warm Hawaii weather might make it last a little longer. Will update if a problem pops up.
customer_reviews.author: Moku

customer_reviews.title: Mean Machine
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is one mean machine. I spray washed my patio, porch, sidewalk, shutters and all my picnic tables and chairs prior to a family reunion and it worked great. It has plenty of power to get dirty jobs done in a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome! 5 stars. This game gets the gray matter pumping. Very enjoyable. lithelilith

customer_reviews.title: works like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: Having the Follow-Me really follow me is a huge time saver and less stressful. I get to focus on my work and not having to stop every 5 min to relocate the base. Great for around the house,, Wish it had a more narrow stream blaster! ** UPDATE 1/12/19 Didnt last as long as I hoped.. Water just runs out the bottom and will not build pressure. Need to figure out how to get fixed - any help?
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working after 2nd Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in December and the first use was pretty good, I thought the follow me feature was pretty cool. Used it for a couple of hours to clean my driveway and was pretty happy with it. I stored it in my garage, in SoCal, so the temperatures weren't extreme by any means. The second time I used it, in July it worked great for 15 minutes, and then started to pulsate and leak profusely from the bottom. Next time, I think I'm just going to go to Harbor Freight and purchase the cheapest unit there and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: mitch jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recomend
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get one unless you have a heated place to store it in the off season. No matter how hard you try to get all the water out of it in the fall some will stay behind and feeeze. when you bring it back out I the spring it’ll just pour water out the bottom. This is the second one I’ve had that’s done this. Aside from that issue the hose kinks up and becomes useless.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it twice since it arrived but am very impressed with overall performance. Setup was easy didn't need to read instruction booklet pretty self explanatory, Love the fact that I can now wash the sand/salt mix that the highway crews put on roads here in ADK park NY in my garage as there are no fumes. In the past I would have to wash vehicles outside in 10 to 30 degree weather with conventional gas pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: doloris pantalone

customer_reviews.title: This is CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.....Original purchase 2017 used only 3X then stored for winter.2018 try & use & the thing hemorrhages h2O out the body housing. Warranty claim honored, Karcher re-issued me a REFURBISHED UNIT w/no remaining warranty . Today 2019, tried to use the replacement & same result, the body housing leaking like a sieve & unit is DEAD.....Even a 2 for 1 deal is a crime, this is a piece of garbage, do yourself a favor & look elsewhere....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use around the house and for washing the vehicles. This pressure washer works awesome. I like that it is on wheels and will follow you around. Not the best when traversing across gravel, but what really is? The soap dispensing system is really handy when washing vehicles. I load it full of car wash soap and then suds the vehicles down, scrub with a brush and then blast the dirt and soapy water away.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one year...
customer_reviews.text: This worked incredible for a year, almost to the day. Bought it on June 10th 2016 and just moments ago, June 22nd 2017, the pressure dropped at the wand and water started pouring out of the machine. I will see what Karcher will do. Will they stand behind their product or will I be stuck with a sprinkler? I will update when I know.
customer_reviews.author: Harry A. Blomstrand

customer_reviews.title: ... the size and what it is I am very pleased with. Function and the dirt blaster nozzle is ...
customer_reviews.text: The pressure washer as a whole for the size and what it is I am very pleased with. Function and the dirt blaster nozzle is great. My main reason for the 3 is because of the stupid male water hose connector. It's cheap plastic and they give you an even cheaper quick disconnect coupling that just leaks at the screw on fitting part. Ended up finally finding a simple female to female adapter, but still had to put thread tape on the plastic cause it still leaks...and yes the o-ring is there. Just be careful with the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: TRANZFR

customer_reviews.title: easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: easy use and plenty of pressure without stripping. works very well with Karcher attachment head, sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Junk, DO NOT BUY !
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Karcher Pressure washer I have owned. I bought 2 from Costco, and they both failed. This one, the "follow me" I bought through Amazon. I imagine I get maybe 3 total hours out of it and failed like every other Karcher product I have owned. That is the plastic pump housing cracks, right along the parting line of the mold. Why fix it? The new part will the same way. So, Ill throw it in the dumpster and consider this an expensive lesson learned... DO NOT BUY !!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Needham

customer_reviews.title: DON’T buy this!  Very unrealizable
customer_reviews.text: This power washer broke after only 3 uses. It was great until it would not turn on again. Of course it stopped working right after the warranty expired. Please save yourself the aggravation and DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: KRG

customer_reviews.title: If you like to play with water, this is what you need.
customer_reviews.text: This is fun to use. Just be sure to use a heavy duty hose, the pressure is pretty strong. It follows behind you like a puppy. Sooooo much better than trying to clean out an area with a hose; does a better job in much less time. These aren't just for men anymore!!
customer_reviews.author: Diamondlover525

customer_reviews.title: This is a good machine! Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, and I would buy it again, but it was very hard to install the wheels. I had to get my neighbor ( a guy with strength) to push in the wheels when assembling the unit. Also I wish there was a way to "pull it" when getting it to the location where I want to use i, rather than carrying it, even though it is not really heavy. It does "follow" you when you are using it. Manufacturer recommends not using an extension cord, and it will not work with the traditional orange cord, but it does work with a 15 Amp, medium duty cord that costs about $26.00 plus tax.
customer_reviews.author: JILL S.  Providence RI

customer_reviews.title: Pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: I like the pull around ability. This is a terrific washer, but the dirt blaster wand failed on me this spring (May 2019) and I haven't been able to get a replacement. The machine works great and the spray wand works fine, but that dirt blaster really works best for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Armand Arce

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I found is the notches to store  the sprayers don't hold the best. ,that could be improved,
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have used it to wash the deck before refinishing it. I use it to wash the cars. I havew had no problems with it. I bought the rotating brush for cars last year and that helps with the cleaning. I love that it follows as you move.
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, and thank goodness for Amazon's ease of return
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this pressure washer turned out to be a dud. No water pressure at all. I am on well water, so that might be a problem, but I get more pressure from a hose nozzle. Very disappointed, and thank goodness for Amazon's ease of return. Contacted the help number, but it was of no help at all, just a recording.
customer_reviews.author: Helen P.Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Pressure of throwing money away
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 1 star because they didnt have the option for Zero stars It had great water pressure but the 7th time I used it I heard a pop noise, it lost water pressure and water just poured out of the bottom. I thought a hose come loose and that i could just put it back on but NNOOOO. It came loose inside the motor so I completely threw money into the wind. But, I loved it when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin potts

customer_reviews.title: The high power wand is high power.  Try the lesser wand first.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Assembled easily although the directions are very small and not perfectly clear. Has worked great for us and really did a good job cleaning items off. The high power wand will take wood off of a wooden deck surface. The hose between the unit and the wand is prone to tangling up, would be nice if it was a “ soft “ hose. Overall we like it.
customer_reviews.author: akb1561

customer_reviews.title: Shuts down numerous times
customer_reviews.text: Good product and easy to use. However the safety switch shuts it down numerous times. Friend also had the same problem. The plug design is also a problem as it prevents using outdoor plugs with weather covers.
customer_reviews.author: LFB

customer_reviews.title: Engineering bad. Bust 2 times.
customer_reviews.text: Had to be replaced by Karcher within one year. Total breakdown inside. Rep told me they were not making anymore. Free replacement. Tried to use this year and same issue. No replacement. Do not buy or bother. Engineering issue.
customer_reviews.author: loyal amazon purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Cleaner for the Home
customer_reviews.text: This pressure cleaner is perfect for the average homeowner, it requires no gas and is the right amount of pressure to clean the siding, the deck and the vehicles without damaging them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Like it and it works fine. The one issue that I have is that if you pull your power washer only the hose puts a lot of stress on the couplers and might break over time... A flexible adapter would be better
customer_reviews.author: Samuel V.

customer_reviews.title: Has developed a water leak and complete loss of pressure....
customer_reviews.text: The unit has developed a major water leak and loss of pressure. I've only had it 4 months ....now upon only the 4th or 5th use there is water leaking from the bottom of the unit and the motor seems to keep trying to rev up. The power washer has not seen any freezing cold weather so it's not due to a freezing issue. Let's see how their rapid exchange program works....I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: OrderFlow

customer_reviews.title: The wheels are a hit!
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought the wheels were not needed...until he used it for the first time. Now he thinks the wheels really make it easier to use. It's perfect to clean the pavers on the lanai that get grungy.
customer_reviews.author: Dianem3

customer_reviews.title: Power washing made easy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine! Setup was easy after I forced the two front wheels into place. In less than five minutes I was power washing my patio deck. In the next hour, I washed both cars and cleaned a bunch of patio furniture. The long power cord is fantastic. Good design. Solid performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Florida Keys

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap plastic construction  Disappoined
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the concept of the pull behind unit. I use pressure washers constantly and own SunJoe and Blue units which work great but liked this design. It's all plastic including the connections which leak even when I apply teflon tape. The wheels are horrible; I ended having to carry the unit around (which of course defeats the intent). I it were not past my time to return (which I missed) this item would have been sent back. I really expected a better product from Karcher.
customer_reviews.author: monkeyAMAZON14

customer_reviews.title: bad qulity
customer_reviews.text: crapped out after just 2 months of use.looked up the problem online and turns out its a very common problem where they leak and cant maintain preasure.the wand also stopped working when put on hard.totally disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mysta Antwyne

customer_reviews.title: Not quite a year
customer_reviews.text: used 15-20 times and owned for less than a year. Performance is average like the rest at this price point but the internals are done and leaks like crazy. Can no longer return of coarse but I will bump my review if I ever get help getting new parts or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch out! There is a timelimit on how long this machine can run
customer_reviews.text: This washer is only suppose to run for max 25min. at a time, then it needs to cool off for 30min. This is what customer service told me, when my K3 broke for good. I need it only once a year, so I was out of warrently by a week the second time I used it. While they acknowledged that there is no hint about this fact anywhere on the machine, packaging or in the manual, they still insisted that the machine was misused. They did not help in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Emton

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap washer.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my second one of these. The first one lasted nearly 8 years dispite being drug to and from work sites and even falling of of a few walls and steps too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Powerful tool
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tool in the world. I am a 66 year old woman who looks for reasons to use this power washer.....
customer_reviews.author: janice g. mcfadyen

customer_reviews.title: Works well - Get an extended warranty
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this. My last one quit about 3 days after warranty but I had purchased the extended warranty that was offered so they gave me credit for a new one. I ordered the exact same one again.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Very ingenious concept, prevents the constant tipping over of upright units. Not as strong a spray as would like, but good enough for household uses. sprayer hose needs to be longer and a more flexible/manageable hose would be nice. In all, a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn O.

customer_reviews.title: great for about 50 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: then an internal part broke. I took the unit apart and determined that the part likely bab would cost 60- 80 to replace. That, along with the labor, and I decided to just buy a SunJoe, which has worked well so far
customer_reviews.author: nevin w mann

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because my mom has had one for a year now and she loved hers. Husband said it broke within a few months... not sure how it happened though. He is pretty rough on everything. Did work very well and did the job when we got it. Read the directions first, don’t just guess you know how it works.
customer_reviews.author: cheesey_cracker

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July of 2017. I used it 4 times and like many other people who have written reviews on this product, it developed a leak and is of no further use. My garden hose has much more pressure. What a waste of $145. This is the second Karcher power-washer I have owned. The first one developed the same problem after 4 years, but I figured it was from over use. Apparently not! What a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my second Follow me - when it works it's great! Unfortunately the first washed one car before it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my second Follow me - when it works it's great! Unfortunately the first washed one car before it sprung a leak from the bottom. I contacted Amazon and they sent me another one which worked for a little while brilliantly - I put it away for the winter and when I took it out to clean the patio it was great - for about an hour. Then same thing, sprung a leak from the bottom. Of course it's out of warranty.....
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it - easy to use without all of the heavy equipment
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned as well as my $400 Honda pressure washer with a lot less hassle. My wife loves it - easy to use without all of the heavy equipment.
customer_reviews.author: MGinSA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all respects, powerful, transportable, easy 2 use for all cleaning tasks, and great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, light weight, easily transported, suberb pressure w excellent adjustable nozzle to instantly vary pressure. Hose was perfect length and so was power cord. Wheels made use a pleasure. Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L. Richter

customer_reviews.title: It's more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Have several uses for it -- siding, very large concrete patio, pergola, car, etc. So far has worked very well on the patio and pergola. Has excellent power in a small package -- so far I've mainly used the variable wand to control that. Connections are sturdy and water-tight. Can store two wands, the power handle, and the electric cord -- just needs a way to store the water hose (which must be stored separately and so can be lost in the garage!). Highly recommend it for the homeowner!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have always liked karcher products
customer_reviews.text: This broke, some internal part is leaking, I have always liked karcher products, this will be my last, the first pressure washer lasted me at least a decade, second three years, I thought maybe a fluke, this one didn't make it but a year, I try to ask karcher for advise although I think I am screwed
customer_reviews.author: Pop's

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN MEXICO....TOTAL JUNK...DON'T BUY THEIR PRODUCTS.  GERMANY MY BUTT!
customer_reviews.text: My second one...first one worked great for awhile...then motor started surging and unit leaking a lot of water. Karcher replaced it with a REFURBISHED" one..I complained, so they sent a new one. Now, I cannot even get this one to turn on. All my electrical outlets are fine..tried three different ones. Breaker on cord is working fine. Tried all troubleshooting remedies..nothing. This company proudly boasts about being from Germany, but what they don't tell you is their products are made in MEXICO...yeah! Junk, all of it. DO NOT BUY THEIR PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.author: rubeinsky

customer_reviews.title: Hassle Free and no more tipping!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful product! Everything I could have wanted and more. I love that it is a pull along and don't have to worry about tipping. Very easy to set up and use plus the pressure is great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E Runnels

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this, it leaked the 2nd time I used it
customer_reviews.author: Z. Pack

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year, never took it out of the box til yesterday, went to use it and it is the biggest piece of junk I've ever tried to deal with, don't spend your money folks, or you will be sick at the loss of your hard eared money going to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: unrelieable
customer_reviews.text: works great when it works. Unfortunately it often doesn't this is the second one I have ordered and it worked well last year, However this year after hesitating it did work for a while, Now it doesn't work. the first one I ordered did the same thing
customer_reviews.author: S. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. I have had two of these things (returned the first one and they sent me a second due to it NOT WORKING!!!)....OMG, if I could give this thing a zero I would. Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Trying to use a different hose and gun you will need a special hose from china
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that that the connections aren't universal only karcher products work will work with this product. I wanted to use a foam cannon and a different gun but soon found out that I couldn't just purchase a normal pressure washer hose with quick connectors because the connection to the pressure washer is unique other wise it works well except sometime when I try to use the suction hose feature it does not always work well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years and 1 month, thats 1 month out of warranty, it started leaking around the soap/chemical inlet. I grumbled a little but order the part to fix it. Got the part in and now it won't even power up. I've been working on equipment for the last 40 years and can usually fix stuff, not this one. I'll just write that money off as a bad investment and buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: mark thompson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little power washer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little power washer. It is easy to set up and doesn't take up much room to store. I have used it for concrete and for vinyl siding. It did a good job on both. As with any power washer, the soap is what does a lot of the work. I am glad I purchased this unit and would get it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and powerful with flawless start/stop. After having a gas powered pressure washer for years, this machine is so quiet and easy to use. Lots if attachments are available and the pull along design is handy.
customer_reviews.author: nj

customer_reviews.title: Did a good job on our wooden deck that had becamed discolored ...
customer_reviews.text: Has performed up to expectations. Did a good job on our wooden deck that had becamed discolored over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts Two Seasons
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two Karchers. Each worked for 2 seasons...........relatively low cost but also relatively low lifetime. I'll most likely find another manufacturer for replacement of the one I just took to the dump.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Follow-along feature a plus
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pressure washer. With the follow-along feature it won't tip over and take unneeded abuse. I haven't tried the soap/cleaner feature but it looks like it will work just fine. The pressure is more than adequate to power off the green-gunk that accumulates on our concrete surfaces here in Oregon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worked great + easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to clean my Composite deck w/ vinly railings. Works great on both. Only issue was that it needed to be very close to the decking to clean it, and therefore only cleaned a 3-4 inch wide strip at a time. BUT the deck looked like brand new when done ! Same for he vinyl railing. Need to try it out on my new truck. I'm sure it will be great. Also worked well on the aluminum siding on my house. Didn't need to be quite as close to the siding as it did on the deck ! Haven't used the high pressure extension hose yet so can't rate it, nor the Quick Connect adapter kit pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L. Maschauer

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking and no pressure after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a couple of days when I got it; worked well. Used it thereafter about once every 3 months. On the last use, it started leaking water and there was no pressure. Very poor quality as compared to the off-brand I purchased over a decade ago for 1/3 less and lasted for 14 years.
customer_reviews.author: albat0m

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.n
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. I bought one and before long it started leaking out the bottom. I called Karshner and after arguing with them, it was still under warranty, they sent another one. I just now started to use it, the new one, and it did the same thing. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Adams

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it look for something else
customer_reviews.text: Not only one but two of them broke on me and I barely used them this design is great but the product is terrible and the worst part is the psi is very low , I don’t recommend it look for something else .
customer_reviews.author: Wonderman

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Used once last year. I drained it as required for winter and kept in the garage. Leaks like a sieve and almost impossible to dismantle without special tool. Frankly avoid this plastic rubbish. Described as German technology and you might assume it's made in Germany? Not! made in Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: walkyourway

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you have limited space in your garage or RV. Has decent pressure for most jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

product_meta.title: Karcher K3 Follow-Me Electric Power Pressure Washer with 4 Rolling Wheels, 1800 PSI, 1.3 GPM
product_meta.description:
Karcher’s 1800 PSI K3 Follow Me pressure washer is designed to “follow you” while you work. Compact and convenient design delivers strong cleaning power for most household jobs. The Vario spray wand allows for quick adjustment between low and high pressure without the need to switch nozzles. For stubborn stains, the patented Dirtblaster spray wand will clean up the toughest chores. Onboard detergent tank included.

Specifications::: Model:K3 Follow Me, Part Number:1.601-990.0, Performance Ratings: 1800 PSI 1.3 GPM, Pump: Karcher N-Cor, Water Inlet: N-Cor Quick Connect, Water Outlet: N-Cor Quick Connect, Trigger Gun: Quick Connect, High Pressure hose: 15ft. Thermoplastic, Included Spray Wands: Vario Power Spray Wand / Dirtblaster Spray Wand, Features: Trigger Gun Holder / Spray Wand Holder / Onboard Detergent Tank, Wheel Size: 89mm (front) + 140mm (rear), Electric Cord: 35ft. with GFCI, Warranty: Two Year Limited Karcher Warranty, Product Weight: 16.3 pounds, Product Dimensions: 21.7 inches x 12 inches x 12.8 inches.
feature_bullets: 1800 PSI, 1.3 GPM Electric Pressure Washer and maximum inlet temperature is 104 degree Fahrenheit
Only four-wheeled electric pressure washer on the market!
Vario Power Spray wand – easily adjust spray right from the wand
Dirtblaster spray wand – tackles the hardest jobs in half the time
N-COR pump – durable, non-corrosive and maintenance-free

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
